title: 3 Quick Ways to Delete Marketplace on Facebook

steps.title: Open Facebook.
steps.content: Open Facebook. This app icon looks like a white "f" on a blue background. You can find this app on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching. You can't change the app's appearance by using the web browser.

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is at the top-right corner on Android and at the bottom-right corner on iOS. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this below: Help & support' .

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is the first option underneath the Settings & privacy header.

steps.title: Tap Navigation bar.
steps.content: Tap Navigation bar . You may need to scroll down to find this option. It will be under the Preferences header.

steps.title: Tap Customize bar.
steps.content: Tap Customize bar . This is at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Auto next to "Marketplace".
steps.content: Tap Auto next to "Marketplace". The drop-down menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Hide.
steps.content: Tap Hide . The Marketplace icon will be hidden from your navigation bar. If you find yourself involved in a Marketplace scam , you can report the seller and contact Facebook . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap ☰.
steps.content: Tap ☰ . This is at the top-right corner on Android and at the bottom-right corner on iOS.

steps.title: Tap Settings & privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings & privacy . You can find this below Help & support .

steps.title: Tap Settings.
steps.content: Tap Settings . This is the first option underneath the Settings & privacy header.

steps.title: Tap Notifications.
steps.content: Tap Notifications . You can find this underneath the Preferences header.

steps.title: Tap Marketplace.
steps.content: Tap Marketplace . You can find this under the What Notifications You Receive header.

steps.title: Toggle off "Allow notifications on Facebook".
steps.content: Toggle off "Allow notifications on Facebook". A pop-up will appear.

steps.title: Tap Turn off.
steps.content: Tap Turn off . This will stop all Marketplace notifications on Facebook, including Push, Email, and SMS notifications.

steps.title: Go to https://facebook.com and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://facebook.com and log in. In this method, you'll disable the notifications from the Marketplace so you don't get emails, SMS messages, or push notifications about the Marketplace's listings.

steps.title: Click the notification bell.
steps.content: Click the notification bell. You'll see this near the right side of the page in the main navigation menu.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This is at the top-right corner of the Notifications menu.

steps.title: Click Notification settings.
steps.content: Click Notification settings . A new page will open.

steps.title: Click Marketplace.
steps.content: Click Marketplace . You can find this under the What Notifications You Receive header.

steps.title: Toggle off "Allow notifications on Facebook".
steps.content: Toggle off "Allow notifications on Facebook". A pop-up will appear.

steps.content: Click Turn off . This will stop all Marketplace notifications on Facebook, including Push, Email, and SMS notifications.
